name: ADP Workforce
description: Integrate with ADP Workforce to list, get, get and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Workers
tools.description: List workers from ADP Workforce. Returns a paginated list of all workers with basic information.

tools.name: Get Worker
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific ADP worker by their associate OID.

tools.name: Get Payroll
tools.description: Get payroll information from ADP. Returns pay statements for a specific worker or a summary of recent payroll runs.

tools.name: List Org Units
tools.description: List organizational units from ADP. Returns departments, divisions, cost centers, and other org structures.

tools.name: Get Benefits
tools.description: Get benefit enrollment information for a specific ADP worker. Returns active benefits, coverage, and plan details.

environment.label: Environment
environment.description: Select the ADP environment to connect to
